synonyms: pañcadaśa-paricchede—in the Fifteenth Chapter; udyāna-vilāse—in His pastimes within the garden; vṛndāvana-bhrame—His taking the garden to be Vṛndāvana; yāhāṅ—where; karilā praveśe—He entered.
translation: In the Fifteenth Chapter is a description of how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu entered a garden on the shore of the sea, mistaking the garden for Vṛndāvana.
